name: Pelipper
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.

attacks.name: Guzzle
attacks.effect: Choose up to 2 basic {W} Energy cards from your hand and attach them to Pelipper. Remove 2 damage counters for each Energy card attached in this way.

attacks.name: Jet Return
attacks.effect: Does 30 times the number of Energy cards attached to Pelipper. Then, put all Energy cards attached to Pelipper on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.
